text.autoconfig.yigd.title: You're in Grave Danger
text.autoconfig.yigd.option.graveSetting: If graves should be generated on death

How players can retrieve their items from graves
ON_USE: Right click the grave
ON_SNEAK: Sneak on top of th grave
ON_STAND: Step on top of the grave
ON_BREAK: Break the grave

How items should be retrieved from graves

IN_INVENTORY: Items go straight into your inventory,
in the same slots as when you died
ON_GROUND: All items land on the ground as
if you broke a chest

If true, players will drop
their head when they die

If true, graves will drop
as blocks when they are used

If true, players are required
to carry a grave block for
one to generate

If false, graves will not
generate if they do not contain
any items or XP

If false, graves can not
be claimed in area affected by
spawn protection

What inventory should be prioritized.
GRAVE: Your inventory will be
generated on top of grave inventory
INVENTORY: Grave inventory will be
generated on top of your inventory

Configure if and how other
players can retrieve your grave

If set to true, other
players will be able to loot
your grave

If set to true, only
the player that killed you can
rob your grave

Will decide after how long
grave robbing is possible.
Set to 0 to be instant

What inventory should be prioritized.
GRAVE: Your inventory will be
generated on top of grave inventory
INVENTORY: Grave inventory will be
generated on top of your inventory
If graves are allowed to expire
The time unit used by After Time
If true, grave will drop its items on de-spawn

Removes items with this enchantment from
the grave. Gives Curse of Vanishing
effect. Useful if soulbound items are
ignored and ends up in both
your inventory and your grave
Format: [namespace]:[enchantment_name]

Items with this enchantment will not
generate in graves, but be kept by the
player when they respawn.
Format: [namespace]:[enchantment_name]

If curse of binding should be
applied when opening graves

Try to place grave using a block whitelist
Whitelist is a block tag located at
data/yigd/tags/blocks/soft_whitelist.json
Defaulted to air, water, and lava

Try to place grave using a block blacklist
Blacklist is a block tag located at
data/yigd/tags/blocks/replace_blacklist.json
Defaulted to bedrock only
This will be a more precise death
position than soft replace

Dimensions with their ID in this list
will not generate graves

You can see the dimension ID
in the bottom of the top left
F3 display (9th row from the top)
If a grave should generate when you fall into the void

Define a list with damage source
names that should result in no
grave generating
What Y level a grave should spawn at when you die in the void

If no block can be overwritten with a
grave, what should happen with your items?

SET_GRAVE: Place a grave where you died (replace blacklisted block)
DROP_ITEMS: Drop all your items where you died
If false, xp will drop outside grave on death
Set XP drop to minecraft default

How many percent of your XP
should be stored in the grave

This will only make a difference
if "Default XP Drop" is set to false

Config for the block generated under the grave,
if it spawn in the air

If a block should generate under
the grave if the grave spawns in the air or over the void
Whitelist can be specified at
data/yigd/tags/blocks/support_replace_whitelist.json

Block generated under grave
in the overworld dimension

Block generated under grave
in the nether dimension

Block generated under grave
in the end dimension

Block generated under grave
in custom dimensions

Send a message to a player
telling them where they died

Changes the way graves render,
and makes the render customizable

If false, grave will only
have a static model, and
no dynamic render

If a shadow should be
rendered for the grave text

Render grave ground layer as
the block the grave is on top of

If true player will see their
graves with the glowing effect
(through walls)
Required true on server to work

The minimum distance from which
graves should use the glow effect.
Default to 0 blocks

Graves will not be able to appear
glowing if further than this many blocks away.
Defaulted to 10, and WILL NOT go beyond chunk render distance
text.autoconfig.yigd.option.utilitySetti:
If the mod should use the
built in soulbound enchant
[Require restart]

Configs for the scroll item,
which has configurable behaviour

SCROLL_OF_RETURN: Right click to
teleport back to your grave
INFO_SCROLL: Right click
to view grave info
DISABLED: Item will not exist

If the player should retrieve
a scroll on respawn
text.autoconfig.yigd.option.commandToggl:
Show the contents of your own
grave(s). OP not required

Show the contents of someone
else's grave(s). OP required
enchantment.yigd.soulbound.desc: Keep your items beyond the grave
text.yigd.message.too_fast: You can not retrieve your items in less than a second
text.yigd.message.timeout: Your grave has been deleted due to you not retrieving it in time
text.yigd.message.timeout.dropped: Your grave has been deleted and dropped your items due to you not retrieving it in time
text.yigd.message.timeout.offline: While you were offline a grave of yours has been deleted due to you not retrieving it in time
text.yigd.message.robbed: One of your graves has been robbed
text.yigd.message.robbed.offline: While you were offline a grave of yours has been robbed
text.yigd.message.retrieve.missing_permi: You are not allowed to retrieve these items
text.yigd.message.retrieve.rob_cooldown: You can retrieve the items from this grave in: %d:%d:%d
text.yigd.message.unclaimed_grave_missin: %s does not have any unclaimed graves
text.yigd.message.rob_command.fail: Could not find grave to fetch
text.yigd.message.rob_command.victim: A server OP has robbed your grave
text.yigd.message.restore_command.fail: Could not find grave to fetch
text.yigd.message.view_command.fail: %s does not have any registered graves
text.yigd.message.scroll_error: Something went wrong.. The game believes you are holding a %s
text.yigd.message.you_have_no_graves: You do not have any graves
text.yigd.message.missing_grave_location: Your grave does not have a registered location
text.yigd.message.cross_dim_error: You can't travel to your grave from another dimension
text.yigd.message.grave_location_info:
Your grave has been generated at
X: %d / Y: %d / Z: %d / %s
text.yigd.gui.grave_select.title: Grave Select
text.yigd.gui.grave_view.title: Grave contents of %s
text.yigd.gui.grave_view.title.missing: How tf did you find this grave. It has no owner
text.yigd.gui.player_select.title: Player Select
